subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4440 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Dreyer,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse is out of stock for the footrest, with restocking expected today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fee you paid.

Wann kommen die bei mir an Bitte um Info Mit freundlichen Grüßen Micha Dreyer Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 16.12.2025 um 13:10 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Michael Dreyer, 
 
 We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse is out of stock for the footrest, with restocking expected today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fee you paid. 
 
 
 
 On
 Tue, 16 Dec at 12:56 AM
 , Michael Dreyer <burg.micha@icloud.com> wrote:
 Wo bleibt meine Sendung 
 Lg Micha Von meinem iPhone gesendet 
 
 Am 08.12.2025 um 12:34 schrieb SIMSONN
Hi Michael Dreyer,  We apologize for the delay; the warehouse in Germany is temporarily out of stock. Your order is expected to begin delivery next week.
